mapper.sql: id, category, name, version, trigger_description, structure_type, graph_definition, input_schema, default_config, is_active, created_by, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sop_templates ( category, name, version, trigger_description, structure_type, graph_definition, input_schema, default_config, is_active, created_by, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{name}, #{version}, #{triggerDescription}, #{structureType}::sop_structure_enum, #{graphDefinition}::jsonb, #{inputSchema}::jsonb, #{defaultConfig}::jsonb, #{isActive}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE sop_templates SET category = #{category}, name = #{name}, version = #{version}, trigger_description = #{triggerDescription}, structure_type = #{structureType}::sop_structure_enum, graph_definition = #{graphDefinition}::jsonb, input_schema = #{inputSchema}::jsonb, default_config = #{defaultConfig}::jsonb, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sop_templates WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY version DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT FROM sop_templates WHERE category = #{category} AND name = #{name} ORDER BY version DESC, created_at DESC
SELECT FROM sop_templates ORDER BY category, name, version DESC
SELECT FROM sop_templates WHERE is_active = #{isActive} ORDER BY category, name, version DESC
SELECT FROM sop_templates WHERE structure_type = #{structureType}::sop_structure_enum ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT FROM sop_templates WHERE is_active = true AND trigger_description ILIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC
